Sentencas: Hybrid systems combining solid oxide fuel cells and gas turbines (SOFC/GT) have been extensively studied in recent years.
Titulo: Optimisation of an SOFC/GT system with CO2-capture

Sentencas: They show very high theoretical electrical efficiencies and are considered as prime contenders for distributed generation.
Titulo: Optimisation of an SOFC/GT system with CO2-capture

Sentencas: The addition of a CO2-capture system could make them even more attractive from an environmental perspective.
Titulo: Optimisation of an SOFC/GT system with CO2-capture

Sentencas: In this study, a SOFC/GT configuration with and without a tail-end CO2 separation plant has been examined.
Titulo: Optimisation of an SOFC/GT system with CO2-capture

Sentencas: In this work, the key parameters of the hybrid system are selected by an innovative tool based on a genetic algorithm (GA), which replaces the cumbersome parameter studies that generally are performed for this purpose.
Titulo: Optimisation of an SOFC/GT system with CO2-capture

Sentencas: The focus is put on the evaluation of the GA as a tool for handling the multi-variable non-linear optimisation problem.
Titulo: Optimisation of an SOFC/GT system with CO2-capture

Sentencas: The result of the optimisation procedure is a SOFC/GT system that exhibits an electrical efficiency above 60% with part capture of the CO2.
Titulo: Optimisation of an SOFC/GT system with CO2-capture
